TopicTitle: [PART][WIP 1.0.5-1.1.x][Dev Release] Chinese Pack Continued v0.2.0.18Y, Crewed Pod WIP! (06-20-2016)

Articles.Content:
eagerly awaiting configuration for stock support, if and when you decide to add it.

In fact cz-3b already has one(because it was first made stock by Kerwis), but not yet in CZ-5. I don't know much of Shenzhou's progress, it may already be in stock size, as its diameter is only 2.8m.

Anyway, THX for your support!

Yep, I have the first stage models and textures. I will be working on the second stage soon, but the textures will probably be similar to the first stage. I also made CFG files for the parts (S1 tank and engine skirt) that are currently in-game.

By the way, does anyone know how to post imgur images on here? It gives me an X every time I paste the URL

It'll be great if you can set up a download after it's useable.

You click the image button on the top toolbar, right next to the URL buttons, then you paste in the image URL (direct URL, not stuff to the image page, for example this: http://i.imgur.com/K2I7abg.jpg).

It'll be great if you can set up a download after it's useable.

You click the image button on the top toolbar, right next to the URL buttons, then you paste in the image URL (direct URL, not stuff to the image page, for example this: http://i.imgur.com/K2I7abg.jpg).

or just write[noparse]imgur images url[/noparse]

Now fully functional (mostly) with CZ-1!

With full RF and RP support for all rockets!

And yay 0.2!

You might want to fix SZ_OrbitingModule in that folder you have all the textures twice ? And all the cfg's are missing bulkheadProfiles = **** ?

EDIT- And the engines are missing 

	MODULE
	{
		name = ModuleSurfaceFX
		thrustProviderModuleIndex = *
		fxMax = **
		maxDistance = **
		falloff = **
		thrustTransformName = thrustTransform
	}

Edited November 14, 2015 by Mecripp2

You might want to fix SZ_OrbitingModule in that folder you have all the textures twice ? And all the cfg's are missing bulkheadProfiles = **** ?

EDIT- And the engines are missing 

    MODULE
    {
        name = ModuleSurfaceFX
        thrustProviderModuleIndex = *
        fxMax = **
        maxDistance = **
        falloff = **
        thrustTransformName = thrustTransform
    }

Well, that is a mistake in folder placing when we wanted to place the new Orbital Module but forgot to delete the old one.

I don't think we need the bulkhead config... It just works fine.

And the SurfaceFX module was missed when we wanted to upgrade the whole project from KSP 0.24 compatible ones.

We'll fix the problems ASAP, probably in a hotfix tomorrow(GMT+8).
My patch was closer of being 1.05 then this not to be rude and the bulkhead is anther way of finding parts by size.
